author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is interested in receiving copies of your Police/Public Safety/Law Enforcement Wellness Programs/Policies.  Wellness programs specific to law enforcement, not organization-wide programs.
Please send your policies/programs to me and I will get them posted in the Knowledge Network as well I’ll forward to our OR member.
Thank you! 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Law Enforcement Wellness Programs/Policies
